name: Installation for Social Media Breakup Coordinator(WIP)
name_original: Installation for Social Media Breakup Coordinator(WIP)
description:
An installation for Social Media Breakup Coordinator at Babycastles.

week 1: "What would you change about social media?"

week 2: "What is your best memory of being online?"

week 3 : "Whats your biggest fear about social media?"

People who came to the exhibition answered the weekly questions on sticky notes and papers .
